LABEL: 0x65
STRING: It was a long time ago.

LABEL: 0x8A
STRING: I was still in the early days of my life.

LABEL: 0xBB
STRING: I rummaged through my memories which seemed to have a veil over them, thinning without even fading.

LABEL: 0x10C
STRING: The warmth of the sun and the scent of the wind were probably the same scenery as everyone else had in their childhood.

LABEL: 0x152
STRING: I remembered a fairy tale.

LABEL: 0x173
STRING: A blue fairy tale about the sea.

LABEL: 0x192
STRING: Images of gentle waves and crystal clear winds.

LABEL: 0x1C5
STRING: The blurred outlines of blue, the brightness of summer...

LABEL: 0x1F3
STRING: But why did it bring tears to my eyes?

LABEL: 0x225
STRING: The mermaid princess, in love with the prince who rescued her, had obtained legs in exchange for her voice.

LABEL: 0x276
STRING: It was a story of a pure princess who had tried to reach the man she loved while losing so much.

LABEL: 0x2C9
STRING: The ending to the fairy tale was beyond my memory.

LABEL: 0x2F0
STRING: In the end――

LABEL: 0x305
STRING: Was she happy?

LABEL: 0x409
STRING: A gentle, comfortable, fluffy, and pure-white horizon.

LABEL: 0x446
STRING: I couldn't even remember how I came to realize I was sleeping there.

LABEL: 0x48D
STRING: In the midst of the morning sun's briskness,

LABEL: 0x4B5
STRING: I slowly awoke from my slumber.

LABEL: 0x4E7
STRING: I pushed open my heavy eyelids.

LABEL: 0x50A
STRING: When I awoke, the first thing I noticed was the fact that I was wrapped in a soft futon.

LABEL: 0x567
STRING: The cloth wrapped around my whole body comfortably and warmly.

LABEL: 0x595
STRING: It quickly tried to pull me back to the world of sleep after finally waking up.

LABEL: 0x5E6
STRING: As I closed and opened my eyes, keeping my consciousness in reality, a question arose within me.

LABEL: 0x64B
STRING: Where in the world was I? And why was I here?

LABEL: 0x69D
STRING: 「...She's awake!」

LABEL: 0x6C8
STRING: 「You're right! Go get the doctor!」

LABEL: 0x6F9
STRING: Their hectic voices echoed overhead, entering through my ears and leaving as they went.

LABEL: 0x74C
STRING: Inside the white cloth, I retraced my memories.

LABEL: 0x77D
STRING: I wracked my sleepy brain.

LABEL: 0x7A3
STRING: Round and round, my drowsy head went.

LABEL: 0x7D0
STRING: But, I wondered why.

LABEL: 0x7F0
STRING: No matter how hard I tried, I couldn't remember the last scene.

LABEL: 0x836
STRING: What came to mind was a single memory.

LABEL: 0x862
STRING: It happened when I went back in time just a little bit further than the break in my consciousness.

LABEL: 0x8AB
STRING: At that time, I was walking along a beach.

LABEL: 0x8DC
STRING: A moment of relaxation as I walked along the beach, soaking my body in the pleasant morning sun.

LABEL: 0x929
STRING: And, by the seashore, I found it.

LABEL: 0x95E
STRING: "Her."

LABEL: 0x979
STRING: I had reached out my hand to the girl lying there――

LABEL: 0xA69
STRING: 「Are you okay?」

LABEL: 0xA8A
STRING: A doctor's voice.

LABEL: 0xAA9
STRING: Their face smiled softly.

LABEL: 0xAD5
STRING: They had the cuteness of a whale shark about them.

LABEL: 0xB09
STRING: Well, it was a form that patients like me could easily relate to.

LABEL: 0xB4A
STRING: I smiled back at them as they grinned and suddenly realized something.

LABEL: 0xB8F
STRING: "Are you okay?" ...Right, was I okay?

LABEL: 0xBCD
STRING: I spun my arms and head around on the spot.

LABEL: 0xC0C
STRING: No problems in particular. My body moved freely.

LABEL: 0xC43
STRING: I spread my arms wide and touched both sides of my head, then patted my face.

LABEL: 0xC86
STRING: I felt like the cheeks I was pulling had gotten a little stiffer, but...

LABEL: 0xCCC
STRING: I probably wasn't injured.

LABEL: 0xCF1
STRING: As I nodded my head, Dr. Whale Shark looked a little serious.

LABEL: 0xD43
STRING: 「Listen to me calmly.

LABEL: 0xD64
STRING: You've been asleep for... four years.」

LABEL: 0xD93
STRING: Four years...?!

LABEL: 0xDAE
STRING: It might look funny to an onlooker that I was sitting on a round chair, opening and closing my mouth like a carp in an aquarium.

LABEL: 0xE1A
STRING: But... when push came to shove, I couldn't help but be surprised.

LABEL: 0xE5F
STRING: 「Are you all right? Calm down. Let's take a deep breath. Come on, deep breaths.」

LABEL: 0xEA4
STRING: Dr. Whale Shark attempted to make me breathe in and out by example.

LABEL: 0xEEC
STRING: When I desperately opened my mouth, my inner self calmed down.

LABEL: 0xF2A
STRING: But still, four years...

LABEL: 0xF4C
STRING: So, it was 2030 now?

LABEL: 0xF77
STRING: As for my age... Yeah, let's not think about it.

LABEL: 0xFAE
STRING: I had a hard time believing it, but the splendorous nurse next to Dr. Whale Shark wasn't laughing either.

LABEL: 0x101E
STRING: I was sure it was definitely true.

LABEL: 0x1047
STRING: Many questions and emotions arose inside me, but for some reason, I remained calm.

LABEL: 0x10A0
STRING: And... somewhere along the way, I had accepted it.

LABEL: 0x10D6
STRING: It was like giving up.

LABEL: 0x10FC
STRING: 「There's someone I want to call.

LABEL: 0x111F
STRING: Okay?」

LABEL: 0x113A
STRING: After watching me nod, Dr. Whale Shark and the nurse got up and left.

LABEL: 0x119B
STRING: I was left alone and looked around this white room.

LABEL: 0x11EE
STRING: And then, the same question repeated itself―where in the world was this place?

LABEL: 0x123B
STRING: I thought it was a hospital, but the hospitals I knew had more of a fresh smell.

LABEL: 0x129F
STRING: A strong, grudge-like tenacity to live, to stay in this world.

LABEL: 0x12E8
STRING: I tried racking my brain, but my mind still hadn't settled into reality.

LABEL: 0x1352
STRING: ――And not long after, a man visited the room.

LABEL: 0x1399
STRING: 「You're awake? ...That must have been tough.」

LABEL: 0x13CA
STRING: He scurried into the room and sat down in the chair where the doctor had just been sitting.

LABEL: 0x141C
STRING: He looked at me with a smile.

LABEL: 0x144D
STRING: A harmless smile.

LABEL: 0x146D
STRING: There was nothing dim in his eyes through the well-shaped glasses, which were remarkably unclouded.

LABEL: 0x14CE
STRING: There was no way he was a bad person.

LABEL: 0x14F2
STRING: I smiled back at him.

LABEL: 0x1516
STRING: He identified himself as the director of the Center for Sustainable Energy Research at ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x1577
STRING: It was rare to find someone whose appearance didn't match their title this much.

LABEL: 0x15B3
STRING: I couldn't believe he was on the board of directors――

LABEL: 0x15F4
STRING: I was surprised, but I had no choice but to believe him when he showed me his ID card.

LABEL: 0x163A
STRING: He seemed used to my wide-eyed reaction to his title.

LABEL: 0x1683
STRING: 「Maybe I should grow a beard after all. I can't help but look young without one.」

LABEL: 0x16D2
STRING: The slender-shouldered man said without cracking a smile.

LABEL: 0x170C
STRING: But why would someone so important come to see me?

LABEL: 0x174F
STRING: That was the only thing I thought.

LABEL: 0x1770
STRING: I was sure he was not someone I should be able to meet.

LABEL: 0x17AA
STRING: He might listen to my words through a monitor, but there was no way that the other side would recognize me... That kind of person.

LABEL: 0x1819
STRING: 「To be honest, my coming to see you has nothing to do with ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x185B
STRING: ――It's a personal matter for me.」

LABEL: 0x1885
STRING: I nodded my head, having no idea of his personal circumstances.

LABEL: 0x18CE
STRING: On the other hand, he was also staring at me...

LABEL: 0x18FE
STRING: Then, before long, he opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x1927
STRING: 「Hey... Could it be...

LABEL: 0x194C
STRING: that you can't talk?」

LABEL: 0x196D
STRING: Huh?

LABEL: 0x197D
STRING: It wasn't until he said it that I realized.

LABEL: 0x19A6
STRING: ――I nodded silently.

LABEL: 0x1A8C
STRING: After that, he often visited my hospital room.

LABEL: 0x1AC3
STRING: My body, which had been weakened by four years of sleep, was slowly but firmly regaining its former vigor.

LABEL: 0x1B42
STRING: Every time we met, he would tell me all sorts of stories.

LABEL: 0x1B6D
STRING: As usual, I couldn't speak, so I just listened.

LABEL: 0x1BAD
STRING: In time, I was able to communicate slightly with sign and body language.

LABEL: 0x1C37
STRING: One day, he said he had a place he wanted to take me.

LABEL: 0x1C78
STRING: I followed closely next to him as he took my hand in a gentlemanly manner.

LABEL: 0x1CB5
STRING: Leaving the white room behind, I found that it was, after all, a hospital.

LABEL: 0x1D02
STRING: A number of doctors and nurses bowed to us as they went about.

LABEL: 0x1D4F
STRING: And eventually, we reached our destination.

LABEL: 0x1D7F
STRING: From one ward to another.

LABEL: 0x1D9B
STRING: Our destination was not a hospital room.

LABEL: 0x1DDC
STRING: I wondered if the equipment in the quiet room had come from some research institution.

LABEL: 0x1E31
STRING: He came to a stop in front of the equipment.

LABEL: 0x1E62
STRING: In front of him was a large capsule―and a girl sleeping inside.

LABEL: 0x1EB2
STRING: 「You found and saved her.」

LABEL: 0x1EE3
STRING: The man spoke in a calm voice.

LABEL: 0x1F0E
STRING: I recognized her as she slept comfortably inside the capsule.

LABEL: 0x1F5D
STRING: Yes. That was definitely her.

LABEL: 0x1F8C
STRING: The one I'd found on the beach that day――

LABEL: 0x1FC2
STRING: 「I haven't told anyone her name, but...

LABEL: 0x2000
STRING: ...She's called Saihouji Rumi.」

LABEL: 0x202B
STRING: It was only when he said it that I realized the name of the man in front of me.

LABEL: 0x2065
STRING: The name engraved on the ID card hanging on his chest.

LABEL: 0x2098
STRING: Saihouji Nozomu――

LABEL: 0x20B0
STRING: It was clear from his gentle gaze that he was her father.

LABEL: 0x20FF
STRING: He quickly removed his eyes from the capsule, looked at me, and smiled.

LABEL: 0x2146
STRING: 「Hitose-kun, you were in the same condition as her not too long ago.」

LABEL: 0x218B
STRING: And then, he began to speak.

LABEL: 0x21B1
STRING: ――That day.

LABEL: 0x21CC
STRING: The day before boarding the <SHEEP>, I was so excited that I couldn't sleep.

LABEL: 0x2213
STRING: I went out for a walk with Ryuuzen Haruki, who had also woken up saying, "I couldn't sleep well."

LABEL: 0x2264
STRING: We visited the beach under a white sky with the morning sun rising.

LABEL: 0x229D
STRING: There, we found a girl lying on the ground.

LABEL: 0x22D9
STRING: For some reason, I remembered the blood on that girl's white dress, who never woke up.

LABEL: 0x2332
STRING: I had to rub it desperately with both hands to get it off.

LABEL: 0x2389
STRING: Wrapped in a one-piece dress, that overly vivid red color didn't suit her porcelain skin, so――

LABEL: 0x23F2
STRING: ...According to him, that was the trigger.

LABEL: 0x242E
STRING: The next day, the <SHEEP> met with an accident.

LABEL: 0x245E
STRING: Haruki and I developed <Alice> at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x2495
STRING: We were rescued four days later, but until recently, I was sleeping inside a capsule.

LABEL: 0x2502
STRING: Haruki, who had been infected with <Alice> as well, had died just like that.

LABEL: 0x2553
STRING: And I, too, was supposed to be dead.

LABEL: 0x259C
STRING: Since I was deemed unrecoverable, I was quarantined in a ROMLES facility.

LABEL: 0x25EA
STRING: But... I was cured.

LABEL: 0x2615
STRING: What was the cause?

LABEL: 0x2630
STRING: I was the first patient to be spontaneously cured of that rare virus.

LABEL: 0x2684
STRING: His story was hard to believe all of a sudden.

LABEL: 0x26C1
STRING: I was supposed to be dead?

LABEL: 0x26F0
STRING: And to think that Haru-chan... had died.

LABEL: 0x272B
STRING: ――Lies.

LABEL: 0x2744
STRING: I wanted to think that, but when I saw the face of the man in front of me, my doubts vanished immediately.

LABEL: 0x2799
STRING: I was sure that this person couldn't lie. I had been convinced of that after meeting with him several times.

LABEL: 0x27FD
STRING: And then, another question came to mind.

LABEL: 0x2832
STRING: What happened to the third member of the <SHEEP>―Yukari-chan?

LABEL: 0x2884
STRING: I unconsciously tugged on his sleeve, and he nodded gently.

LABEL: 0x28C1
STRING: 「Momoi Yukari is safe.

LABEL: 0x28E9
STRING: She escaped infection... You were all in the same enclosed space, so she was really lucky.

LABEL: 0x293B
STRING: She came to visit you once, but you were still asleep.」

LABEL: 0x2981
STRING: Thank goodness―she was alive.

LABEL: 0x29A8
STRING: Relief and anticipation welled up in my chest.

LABEL: 0x29DE
STRING: If she was alive... Someday, I was sure.

LABEL: 0x2A11
STRING: 「However,

LABEL: 0x2A22
STRING: it would probably be better if you didn't see each other.」

LABEL: 0x2A4F
STRING: Saihouji's calm smile never wavered as he told the truth.

LABEL: 0x2A90
STRING: According to him, Yukari thought that Haruki was still alive.

LABEL: 0x2ACE
STRING: No, she believed that.

LABEL: 0x2AEF
STRING: She came to visit me, and when I was asleep, she thought I was Haruki until the very end.

LABEL: 0x2B47
STRING: I was dead, and Ryuuzen Haruki was still alive――

LABEL: 0x2B7E
STRING: Yukari would never let go of that twisted truth.

LABEL: 0x2BBD
STRING: If I confronted her and pushed the fact that it was Haruki who had died by meeting her face to face,

LABEL: 0x2C0F
STRING: what would happen to her...?

LABEL: 0x2C3C
STRING: ――When I thought about that, I couldn't say that I wanted to meet her.

LABEL: 0x2C80
STRING: And then, I finally took it in.

LABEL: 0x2CAB
STRING: In that <SHEEP> accident,

LABEL: 0x2CDD
STRING: I had lost two precious friends.

LABEL: 0x2D11
STRING: I stared at the capsule in which the girl slept, with no name written on it.

LABEL: 0x2D62
STRING: There was not a single identifier there.

LABEL: 0x2D8C
STRING: There was no special treatment for his daughter, for ROMLES' "high-ranking officer."

LABEL: 0x2DDF
STRING: 「It would be difficult for everyone if it became clear that she was my daughter, wouldn't it? I don't want anyone to sympathize with me.

LABEL: 0x2E53
STRING: I can't wield that kind of privilege when I'm the one who taught my daughters to always be fair.」

LABEL: 0x2EBF
STRING: He was... strict with himself.

LABEL: 0x2EEE
STRING: And, to his own daughter as well.

LABEL: 0x2F19
STRING: A father would make use of everything he had to save his daughter――

LABEL: 0x2F53
STRING: He had absolutely nothing to do with such mundane, beautiful stories.

LABEL: 0x2F96
STRING: The way he looked at his daughter lovingly... Was it the same as the way he looked at me?

LABEL: 0x2FF0
STRING: 「I'm a scientist.」

LABEL: 0x3011
STRING: The man said it so plainly that it gave me chills.

LABEL: 0x3048
STRING: Because he was a scientist, he couldn't treat his daughter as special?

LABEL: 0x307E
STRING: Was such a thing really possible?

LABEL: 0x30B3
STRING: Trying to treat all humans evenly, side by side, as equals――

LABEL: 0x30F8
STRING: Impartiality, he said, was the domain of ethics as well as science.

LABEL: 0x3139
STRING: 「Scientists mustn't lose their morality.」

LABEL: 0x316D
STRING: However, he said that he didn't have a religious creed.

LABEL: 0x319C
STRING: 「Unfortunately, I'm not religious. ...But, I'm not denying faith itself.」

LABEL: 0x31F1
STRING: Didn't you deny the theory of creation when you were talking about evolution or something before?

LABEL: 0x323B
STRING: My dubious look seemed to make him think of a story he had told me before.

LABEL: 0x3286
STRING: 「It's not because it's religious or unscientific that it's unacceptable.

LABEL: 0x32C6
STRING: I can't accept it because it was denied by science, in the field of science.

LABEL: 0x330C
STRING: ――In other words, it can't be reproduced.」

LABEL: 0x333C
STRING: If it wasn't reproducible, it wasn't science――

LABEL: 0x336C
STRING: If that was the case, then one's life couldn't be handled by science.

LABEL: 0x33AF
STRING: It sounded like a sophism, but he squinted through his well-shaped glasses.

LABEL: 0x3400
STRING: 「That's right. That's why people are interesting.」

LABEL: 0x342D
STRING: As he spoke, he looked down at the capsule again.

LABEL: 0x3465
STRING: I couldn't see what was behind his glasses reflecting the lights.

LABEL: 0x3585
STRING: 「I have one more place to go, if that's okay.」

LABEL: 0x35C4
STRING: A modest question―I had no reason to refuse.

LABEL: 0x3607
STRING: He led me to a room a short distance away.

LABEL: 0x3642
STRING: There was a capsule there, just like in the previous room.

LABEL: 0x3681
STRING: The girl sleeping on the table above the capsule... Was it my imagination, or did she look somewhat similar to the girl I saw just now...?

LABEL: 0x36E1
STRING: 「...Honestly.」

LABEL: 0x3700
STRING: He sighed.

LABEL: 0x3729
STRING: 「Just because they're sisters doesn't mean they have to look this much alike.」

LABEL: 0x3768
STRING: Sisters... In other words, this girl sleeping in front of me was also his daughter.

LABEL: 0x37A9
STRING: ――Ah.

LABEL: 0x37BF
STRING: The realization of that fact made my chest tighten.

LABEL: 0x37F6
STRING: It wasn't just me... It was him, too.

LABEL: 0x3827
STRING: He, too, had lost two loved ones all at once――

LABEL: 0x385B
STRING: 「Then again, compared to being left alone, it was probably much better. For them.」

LABEL: 0x38CA
STRING: The man said the sisters were very close.

LABEL: 0x3901
STRING: But... what came to mind for me was not an image of close sisters.

LABEL: 0x3950
STRING: One person being left behind――

LABEL: 0x3977
STRING: Now that I was the only one who'd died, what had he been doing these past four years?

LABEL: 0x39D9
STRING: How many times had I woken up and thought that I wanted to go see him?

LABEL: 0x3A1E
STRING: I wanted to know how he was doing and if he was well.

LABEL: 0x3A5D
STRING: I wanted to tell him that I was still alive.

LABEL: 0x3AA2
STRING: But―in the end, I was here without being able to go.

LABEL: 0x3AE1
STRING: I was supposed to be dead――

LABEL: 0x3B15
STRING: Seeing his dead sister come back to him after all this time... What would he think? I couldn't bring myself to go see him.

LABEL: 0x3C39
STRING: ――Why was <Alice> called <Alice>?

LABEL: 0x3C7C
STRING: On the way back from visiting the sleeping girls infected by <Alice>, I asked him that, somewhat casually.

LABEL: 0x3CD9
STRING: 「Ah, about that...」

LABEL: 0x3D00
STRING: For some reason, Saihouji hesitated for a moment, then slowly opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x3D49
STRING: 「Because those girls loved it.

LABEL: 0x3D74
STRING: Especially Rumi.

LABEL: 0x3D96
STRING: If they are going to be stigmatized when they wake up anyway,

LABEL: 0x3DDC
STRING: it'd be nice if it had a name they liked... that's all.」

LABEL: 0x3E1A
STRING: He then smiled shyly, somewhat different from his usual mild smile.

LABEL: 0x3E77
STRING: 「I thought they would both be happy if it was called <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x3EDE
STRING: ...This was the person who spread that name?

LABEL: 0x3F0E
STRING: He was, indeed, a father.

LABEL: 0x401E
STRING: August 5th, 2032.

LABEL: 0x4038
STRING: I flipped through the dates and suddenly came to a realization.

LABEL: 0x4062
STRING: I see. Before I knew it, six years had already passed since that day.

LABEL: 0x40A7
STRING: Six years ago, I was put to sleep by <Alice>, and when I awoke again, I had lost my voice.

LABEL: 0x4100
STRING: But now, after two years of daily rehabilitation after waking up...

LABEL: 0x414C
STRING: My body was completely back to normal.

LABEL: 0x418C
STRING: I was now able to move around,

LABEL: 0x41CC
STRING: but I still couldn't go far because I couldn't speak in case of emergency and was considered dead to the world in the first place.

LABEL: 0x4243
STRING: But, to do nothing was――

LABEL: 0x4270
STRING: That was why I was working as an engineer.

LABEL: 0x42B3
STRING: Surprisingly, programming had become a mandatory subject while I was sleeping.

LABEL: 0x432B
STRING: 「Not being able to program will be a huge loss for you in the future.

LABEL: 0x4379
STRING: Besides, if you're just writing code, you wouldn't have to meet with people.」

LABEL: 0x43C6
STRING: I followed Saihouji's advice.

LABEL: 0x43EE
STRING: My days of sitting at my desk and coding had become my daily life.

LABEL: 0x4440
STRING: My daily life consisted of a white room, programming, and――

LABEL: 0x4480
STRING: ――Visits from Saihouji.

LABEL: 0x44B3
STRING: Two years had passed since we first met. He still looked young and somewhat unreliable, yet he seemed to be busy working day after day.

LABEL: 0x452C
STRING: Nevertheless, I wondered if the reason he came here so often was because he had two daughters who hadn't woken up yet.

LABEL: 0x463C
STRING: 「I have a birthday present for you today.」

LABEL: 0x466F
STRING: That was a surprise――

LABEL: 0x4685
STRING: I had never told him my birthday.

LABEL: 0x46BC
STRING: I wondered how he knew―and soon realized.

LABEL: 0x46F9
STRING: My personal information, living as a patient in this hospital...

LABEL: 0x473F
STRING: If he wanted to see it, there was no stopping him.

LABEL: 0x477D
STRING: Smiling, he pulled out a small dongle.

LABEL: 0x47B8
STRING: He inserted it into a PDA and smiled like a mischievous child.

LABEL: 0x4802
STRING: 「Ready?」

LABEL: 0x481D
STRING: And at his signal, what flowed out of the PDA was――

LABEL: 0x4874
STRING: A familiar voice.

LABEL: 0x4889
STRING: ――My voice.

LABEL: 0x48A9
STRING: Instantly, I felt the corners of my eyes well up and covered my face.

LABEL: 0x48DC
STRING: That was completely unexpected.

LABEL: 0x48FF
STRING: I didn't hear it wrong. I should have lost it, my――

LABEL: 0x493E
STRING: As I desperately tried to hold back my tears, Saihouji nodded in satisfaction.

LABEL: 0x498B
STRING: 「It's your voice when you were alive.

LABEL: 0x49A8
STRING: It's well reproduced, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x49D2
STRING: And that wasn't his only birthday present.

LABEL: 0x4A17
STRING: 「Try this on.」

LABEL: 0x4A3E
STRING: He handed me something like a helmet.

LABEL: 0x4A70
STRING: The black full-face helmet was heavier than it looked.

LABEL: 0x4AA5
STRING: 「It's clumsy, but please forgive me. Basically, it's like an electroencephalogram. I think it's better than putting electrodes directly on you.」

LABEL: 0x4B12
STRING: I wore it as I was told.

LABEL: 0x4B36
STRING: 「Maybe a self introduction to start with?」

LABEL: 0x4B87
STRING: Obeying him as I twisted my head, I hesitantly put the words into my brain.

LABEL: 0x4BD2
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x4C08
STRING: My voice... came out.

LABEL: 0x4C30
STRING: 「It'll read the activity in your language area. If you wear this and think about it, you'll be able to speak.

LABEL: 0x4C80
STRING: You can use it when you need it. With this, there will be nothing left to keep you here.」

LABEL: 0x4CE1
STRING: I removed the device and hugged him.

LABEL: 0x4D0B
STRING: I gratefully accepted his gift.

LABEL: 0x4D40
STRING: With this―I shook off the name that entered my mind for a moment.

LABEL: 0x4D7D
STRING: ...I didn't have anyone I wanted to talk to anymore.

LABEL: 0x4DB5
STRING: 「And there's one more thing.」

LABEL: 0x4DE6
STRING: Saihouji gestured with his finger.

LABEL: 0x4E2B
STRING: 「Do you know about the plan for the <SHEEP III>?」

LABEL: 0x4E69
STRING: It was a large submarine that had taken over the name of the one I'd boarded six years ago.

LABEL: 0x4EB8
STRING: I had heard of the name but was not told much about it, perhaps out of concern for me.

LABEL: 0x4F27
STRING: 「The <SHEEP III>, a large submersible... There are plans to install the latest interactive AI in it.

LABEL: 0x4F78
STRING: Project Oracle... An oracle machine proposed by Turing...」

LABEL: 0x4FCA
STRING: He never stopped when it came to the history of science.

LABEL: 0x5003
STRING: After an extended 20-minute talk about Turing's accomplishments...

LABEL: 0x5042
STRING: 「...And so, I think we'll name the first application "Lighthouse."

LABEL: 0x50A2
STRING: Do you know the meaning of the word? The thing that illuminates your path in the dark seas――」

LABEL: 0x5119
STRING: Saihouji's eyes were full of life as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x5150
STRING: Like an innocent child talking about a dream―his sparkling eyes didn't make him look like a father with two daughters at all.

LABEL: 0x51C0
STRING: 「A device that casts light on passengers' questions in the sea.

LABEL: 0x51FE
STRING: That's "Project Oracle: Lighthouse"―or POL for short.」

LABEL: 0x524A
STRING: 「So, I have an idea――

LABEL: 0x527E
STRING: ――I was thinking of using your voice.」

LABEL: 0x52AB
STRING: Saying that, Saihouji laughed like a mischievous child.

LABEL: 0x549D
STRING: Whenever he visited me, he was always alone.

LABEL: 0x54D6
STRING: Thinking back, I had never even seen him talking to anyone other than me.

LABEL: 0x5533
STRING: Considering his status, he should have at least one assistant, but...

LABEL: 0x557D
STRING: Whenever he came here, he was always alone, and at least to my eyes, he appeared to be a very private person.

LABEL: 0x55ED
STRING: But, one rainy day, when I greeted him as usual, there was another man next to Saihouji.

LABEL: 0x5652
STRING: In contrast to Saihouji, who was slender and not tall, his muscular shoulders were broad, and he appeared to be on the taller side.

LABEL: 0x56B7
STRING: The stern look on his face, which suited his physique well, made me involuntarily shrivel up even though it was rude of me.

LABEL: 0x5722
STRING: Who was this person?

LABEL: 0x5745
STRING: Could it be someone from the Something-or-other Committee who blamed Saihouji for dawdling around without doing his job even though he was a board member?

LABEL: 0x57A9
STRING: 「Well, I'm stopping by here. Are you going home, Shinichiro?」

LABEL: 0x57EC
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x5803
STRING: His low voice and short answer were just as I had imagined.

LABEL: 0x583E
STRING: But Shinichiro... Though he looked much older than Saihouji, he called out to him as if they were friends...

LABEL: 0x58A7
STRING: ...Now that I thought about it, if he was a board member, then maybe Saihouji was older than I thought.

LABEL: 0x5903
STRING: While I was thinking about this and other things, the man left.

LABEL: 0x593A
STRING: 「Oh, he's Shinichiro Nomura―a friend of mine from university.」

LABEL: 0x5977
STRING: Which meant they weren't that far apart in age after all.

LABEL: 0x59BE
STRING: 「He's... Yes, he's not a bad guy, but, well, he's a little different.

LABEL: 0x5A16
STRING: I'm hesitant to say this about my friend, but I don't recommend getting too close to him.」

LABEL: 0x5A7D
STRING: They had to be very close to each other if they were able to joke around with each other like that.

LABEL: 0x5ACB
STRING: After that, Nomura would occasionally show up with Saihouji, but they always parted ways at the door.

LABEL: 0x5B2F
STRING: He never came into the room to have a conversation.

LABEL: 0x5B70
STRING: His stern face and glaring eyes...

LABEL: 0x5B9C
STRING: One-word answers in a low voice were all I ever heard from him.

LABEL: 0x5D9E
STRING: One month before the departure of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x5DC9
STRING: I was fully involved in the project, thanks to Saihouji.

LABEL: 0x5E1C
STRING: I was relieved to see that the navigation program was completed in time.

LABEL: 0x5E69
STRING: As for what my part was in it――

LABEL: 0x5E92
STRING: It was to prevent contingencies.

LABEL: 0x5EB9
STRING: It meant accurately monitoring sudden changes in weather and the like,

LABEL: 0x5EFD
STRING: correcting their own position, and writing a program to carry passengers safely.

LABEL: 0x5F37
STRING: Honestly, this wasn't the type of job I was good at.

LABEL: 0x5F70
STRING: In the first place, programming was something I learned while I was in the hospital.

LABEL: 0x5FD3
STRING: Besides, hazard prediction and all that――

LABEL: 0x5FFF
STRING: Wasn't it more fun if things were a bit dangerous?

LABEL: 0x6038
STRING: An exciting, happy, and wild deep-sea journey.

LABEL: 0x606B
STRING: The anticipation of a harrowing adventure was not at all what one would expect.

LABEL: 0x60B7
STRING: I was growing anxious, but from what I'd heard, some girl had designed most of it.

LABEL: 0x611A
STRING: Furthermore, she was said to be young, although her age hadn't been revealed.

LABEL: 0x616F
STRING: She seemed to be working remotely, just like me.

LABEL: 0x61BE
STRING: ...I wondered who she was.

LABEL: 0x61E1
STRING: When I asked the visiting Saihouji, he told me the following:

LABEL: 0x621E
STRING: 「Yeah, she's a genius.

LABEL: 0x623D
STRING: No... Maybe "prodigy" is a better word.」

LABEL: 0x626D
STRING: The difference between a genius and a prodigy, huh?

LABEL: 0x6292
STRING: He went out of his way to rephrase it, so there must be something different about them.

LABEL: 0x62DC
STRING: Unfortunately, it didn't ring a bell with me.

LABEL: 0x630D
STRING: In any case... to me, an ordinary person, she was amazing.

LABEL: 0x6352
STRING: I only knew her through the exchange of code from the program, but...

LABEL: 0x6396
STRING: Its beauty was unparalleled.

LABEL: 0x63BF
STRING: I was an amateur, far from being called a geek, but...

LABEL: 0x63F7
STRING: I was confident I could tell how good the code she wrote was.

LABEL: 0x6434
STRING: I spent my days writing programs with her.

LABEL: 0x6480
STRING: Then one day, Saihouji Nozomu came to see me.

LABEL: 0x64B5
STRING: That in itself was not unusual, but that day he was acting strangely.

LABEL: 0x6516
STRING: No sooner had he entered the room than he glanced back and forth.

LABEL: 0x6560
STRING: He took my hand and helped me to my feet――

LABEL: 0x6593
STRING: Ow! It hurt!

LABEL: 0x65B3
STRING: I slapped him on the back.

LABEL: 0x65E2
STRING: 「Oh, sorry, sorry.」

LABEL: 0x6607
STRING: Once I was freed from his grip, I caught my breath.

LABEL: 0x6637
STRING: Saihouji was in a state of unusual tension... I wondered what was wrong with him.

LABEL: 0x667F
STRING: His eyes shone even brighter than usual as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x66C2
STRING: 「Listen to me! ...She's awake!」

LABEL: 0x6701
STRING: It was the girl I had seen sleeping that day.

LABEL: 0x673A
STRING: The report was that Saihouji Tokiwa, his eldest daughter, had woken up.

LABEL: 0x6785
STRING: ――From what I heard,

LABEL: 0x67BD
STRING: they used retrovirus vectors to perform the treatment to reintroduce lost clock genes.

LABEL: 0x6805
STRING: He sounded so genuinely happy.

LABEL: 0x6853
STRING: I wanted to speak up, too, so I put on the helmet-shaped device next to my pillow.

LABEL: 0x6890
STRING: 「Congratulations! She was cured of <Alice>! Thank goodness...」

LABEL: 0x68E9
STRING: 「Yes... With the help of so many people, we've finally made it.」

LABEL: 0x6930
STRING: 「Now then, next it's Rumi-chan's turn to wake up.」

LABEL: 0x6975
STRING: 「No, I'll let Rumi sleep.」

LABEL: 0x69A4
STRING: ――Huh?

LABEL: 0x69B8
STRING: Without any care or cracking a smile, what did he just say?

LABEL: 0x6A1E
STRING: 「Think about it.

LABEL: 0x6A3E
STRING: If she heals completely, <Alice> will disappear from the face of the Earth.

LABEL: 0x6A94
STRING: We can't lose the only carrier of <Alice> in existence.」

LABEL: 0x6AF8
STRING: Hearing those words, a certain anecdote crossed my mind.

LABEL: 0x6B46
STRING: Those were well-known initials in the world of neuroscience.

LABEL: 0x6B85
STRING: Having their hippocampus removed by surgery, they developed anterograde amnesia.

LABEL: 0x6BCA
STRING: Those extremely rare symptoms served as the perfect material for the scientists,

LABEL: 0x6C10
STRING: and they contributed to science all their life.

LABEL: 0x6C49
STRING: Even after their death, their brain had been dissected and provided many insights.

LABEL: 0x6C95
STRING: Patients with rare cases――

LABEL: 0x6CB9
STRING: In that sense, she was no different.

LABEL: 0x6CEA
STRING: Once she was cured, the research would stop.

LABEL: 0x6D1F
STRING: In other words―he had made a choice.

LABEL: 0x6D4E
STRING: Which of the two would be treated?

LABEL: 0x6D93
STRING: And the choice between contributing to science and his own daughter――

LABEL: 0x6DD5
STRING: 「The treatment was successful―a world first. Of course it was. There are only a limited number of cases.」

LABEL: 0x6E2C
STRING: Saihouji, still looking excited and smiling, tried to share his joy with me.

LABEL: 0x6E7D
STRING: But... how was he able to smile like that?

LABEL: 0x6EB6
STRING: How could you smile after choosing one of your daughters to sacrifice?

LABEL: 0x6F02
STRING: I couldn't help but blurt it out.

LABEL: 0x6F29
STRING: 「But... aren't you still a father?」

LABEL: 0x6F54
STRING: For a moment, he looked surprised. He then immediately spoke in his usual voice.

LABEL: 0x6FA5
STRING: 「Yes――

LABEL: 0x6FB8
STRING: And, a scientist.

LABEL: 0x6FD6
STRING: As a father and a scientist, I have to set a standard for my daughters.」

LABEL: 0x701D
STRING: ――It was strange.

LABEL: 0x7037
STRING: I didn't understand what he was saying at all. He was insane.

LABEL: 0x707D
STRING: 「Why are norms so important?」

LABEL: 0x70BA
STRING: 「You have better things to think about than that.」

LABEL: 0x70F7
STRING: 「Wasn't she your precious daughter?」

LABEL: 0x7128
STRING: 「How can you keep smiling like that?」

LABEL: 0x715D
STRING: 「Didn't you want to save your daughter?」

LABEL: 0x7192
STRING: I wasn't trying to talk.

LABEL: 0x71BA
STRING: Still, my speech center formed words of its own accord――I couldn't stop it.

LABEL: 0x7206
STRING: 「Why don't you think about your daughters for once?!」

LABEL: 0x724F
STRING: And having said that much, I removed the device.

LABEL: 0x7288
STRING: I took it off... and looked into his eyes.

LABEL: 0x72AF
STRING: I stared at Saihouji in the unobstructed room temperature.

LABEL: 0x72EE
STRING: He opened his mouth slightly in surprise and looked at me wide-eyed.

LABEL: 0x733D
STRING: Then, he swallowed whatever words he was about to say and shut his mouth.

LABEL: 0x7391
STRING: As he was about to leave the room, Saihouji turned around and spoke up.

LABEL: 0x73D6
STRING: 「That's right...

LABEL: 0x73ED
STRING: The maiden voyage of the <SHEEP III> is set for August%N1st.

LABEL: 0x7422
STRING: I can't give you a spot on the ship, but... I've prepared a seat for you at the ceremony that day.」

LABEL: 0x747F
STRING: He could not hide his somber appearance, but he still had his usual gentle smile on his face.

LABEL: 0x74E0
STRING: 「...Maybe you're right.

LABEL: 0x750E
STRING: Just once, I'd like to show her the sea, too.」

LABEL: 0x7545
STRING: With that, he left the room.

LABEL: 0x7573
STRING: Saihouji Nozomu stopped visiting after that.

LABEL: 0x76BF
STRING: August 1st――

LABEL: 0x76D8
STRING: I was at the seat prepared for me at the launch ceremony of the <SHEEP III> by Saihouji Nozomu, whom I had not seen once since that day.

LABEL: 0x773A
STRING: It was a nice seat.

LABEL: 0x775B
STRING: I was forced to sit on a very important seat in the venue under the blazing sun, which was air-conditioned despite being outdoors.

LABEL: 0x77BB
STRING: Moreover, Saihouji, who was said to have left that seat for me, was nowhere to be seen.

LABEL: 0x7806
STRING: He was nowhere in the venue, if I had to guess.

LABEL: 0x7846
STRING: I saw that there was one empty seat in the top-class row, which was even better than the one I sat in.

LABEL: 0x789C
STRING: The ceremony went without a hitch, and the time for the ship to set sail was finally approaching.

LABEL: 0x78DF
STRING: Sweat dripped from my chin into the clenched fist on my lap.

LABEL: 0x791C
STRING: I suppressed my trembling hand with my other and repeated the words I'd repeated every day until now.

LABEL: 0x796F
STRING: Don't worry―you've simulated it countless times.

LABEL: 0x79B1
STRING: I quietly closed my eyes.

LABEL: 0x79DA
STRING: It would be a great voyage―it was obvious.

LABEL: 0x7A0D
STRING: Everything was different from that time.

LABEL: 0x7A40
STRING: I would not be misled by the name <SHEEP>.

LABEL: 0x7A76
STRING: ――No one else would be lost.

LABEL: 0x7A9E
STRING: All my fears were unfounded, and the <SHEEP III> went out to sea without incident.

LABEL: 0x7AF4
STRING: Now then...

LABEL: 0x7B0C
STRING: A person who was supposed to be dead couldn't expose their face.

LABEL: 0x7B57
STRING: What should I do when I get back?

LABEL: 0x7B7B
STRING: It had been a while since I'd been outside this much, and I was exhausted.

LABEL: 0x7BC6
STRING: Let's go to bed early―or so I thought.

LABEL: 0x7BF0
STRING: A murmur reached my back as I quickly stood up from my seat and hurried to leave.

LABEL: 0x7C3A
STRING: 「...She's not there!」

LABEL: 0x7C63
STRING: 「Yes, she disappeared. It's definitely her.」

LABEL: 0x7C9E
STRING: 「I'm not sure. There doesn't seem to be any confirmation since last night.」

LABEL: 0x7CE5
STRING: 「――<Alice> has disappeared!」

LABEL: 0x7DF1
STRING: A few days passed in an instant in the midst of the chaos.

LABEL: 0x7E22
STRING: Before I knew it, it was August 4th.

LABEL: 0x7E57
STRING: The sinking of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x7E79
STRING: Saihouji Rumi's disappearance.

LABEL: 0x7E9A
STRING: The super flare.

LABEL: 0x7EB9
STRING: Nothing had been resolved.

LABEL: 0x7EDF
STRING: But... there was one thing that escaped the worst.

LABEL: 0x7F0E
STRING: At around 18:00 on August 3rd, an exploration vessel crashed into the <Isle of Wind> while searching for the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x7F74
STRING: Due to the super flare, its GPS-based sensors were not working.

LABEL: 0x7FCA
STRING: Several windmills had fallen, but...

LABEL: 0x7FF0
STRING: Fortunately, the damage to the core artificial photosynthesis float was minor.

LABEL: 0x8051
STRING: Artificial photosynthesis produced organic materials such as methane and ethane as byproducts.

LABEL: 0x809D
STRING: If it had ignited... it would have been nothing compared to this, I thought.

LABEL: 0x80E1
STRING: I was standing on a beach.

LABEL: 0x8114
STRING: ...I could see small flames in the distance.

LABEL: 0x813F
STRING: I was relieved that it had ended on this scale.

LABEL: 0x8178
STRING: It didn't change the fact that it was a disaster, but the situation would be resolved.

LABEL: 0x81C9
STRING: More importantly, the real problem was――

LABEL: 0x81F4
STRING: I faced Kurama Bay.

LABEL: 0x820E
STRING: Nothing was over yet.

LABEL: 0x8237
STRING: Beneath these waves――

LABEL: 0x825C
STRING: was where they had sank.

LABEL: 0x8280
STRING: Maybe there was a problem with the program I wrote.

LABEL: 0x82C7
STRING: The ones who built the program related to crisis management were me and that talented girl.

LABEL: 0x8316
STRING: If there was a mistake, I was sure that――

LABEL: 0x8342
STRING: There was no point in thinking about it, but I couldn't help it.

LABEL: 0x8389
STRING: If so... had I taken their lives?

LABEL: 0x83CB
STRING: ...Just then.

LABEL: 0x83E8
STRING: Suddenly, my eyes were drawn to something as it entered my field of vision.

LABEL: 0x8425
STRING: Something yellow floating by the shore, lapping in the waves.

LABEL: 0x846A
STRING: I'd seen that somewhere before. If I was not mistaken, it was the Argo Project's――

LABEL: 0x84C6
STRING: But, it looked somehow different from the Argo floats I'd seen before.

LABEL: 0x850D
STRING: On closer inspection, its body was damaged and ripped.

LABEL: 0x855B
STRING: Did this have something to do with the <SHEEP III>?

LABEL: 0x8593
STRING: When the thought occurred to me, I rushed over and put my hand on the Argo float.

LABEL: 0x85E2
STRING: ――And.

LABEL: 0x85F9
STRING: An unfamiliar pitch-black object peeked out from the side of a large tear.

LABEL: 0x863E
STRING: What was that? It was as if darkness itself had manifested, but for some reason, it looked familiar.

LABEL: 0x86BC
STRING: I stuck out my fingers and touched the black object peeking out from the float.

LABEL: 0x870B
STRING: It glistened wet and black. It was hard and cold to the touch.

LABEL: 0x8756
STRING: I thrust my hand in even further and pulled it out――

LABEL: 0x8786
STRING: It was a small, jet-black cube.

LABEL: 0x87CB
STRING: I remembered seeing something similar a long time ago.

LABEL: 0x87FF
STRING: ...That was the very black box that held the records of a submarine.

LABEL: 0x884E
STRING: But in that case, this was――

LABEL: 0x8873
STRING: And then, I immediately thought of%Nsomething.

LABEL: 0x88A2
STRING: I see, this was the <SHEEP III's>――

LABEL: 0x88D1
STRING: I hurried back to my private room and checked the data inside.

LABEL: 0x8912
STRING: The collage of various images on the screen eventually formed a single image and streamed in chronological order.

LABEL: 0x8983
STRING: And... there was some incredible information left there.

LABEL: 0x89C2
STRING: Above all――

LABEL: 0x89D7
STRING: Even after seven years, I recognized his face in an instant.

LABEL: 0x8A1A
STRING: ...Hitoha?!

LABEL: 0x8A35
STRING: Why was he there――

LABEL: 0x8A5F
STRING: Out of all the bad premonitions I could imagine, the biggest one hit me.

LABEL: 0x8AA4
STRING: Why he was inside the ship, and the possibility that it was because of me――

LABEL: 0x8AFE
STRING: ...I had to get in touch with him immediately.

LABEL: 0x8B33
STRING: I had to rescue him somehow.

LABEL: 0x8B66
STRING: If I contacted ROMLES... If I told them what was going on...

LABEL: 0x8BB4
STRING: But, he wasn't the only thing in the video.

LABEL: 0x8BF5
STRING: A vivid bioluminescence had entered the ship.

LABEL: 0x8C24
STRING: I'd never forget those colors.

LABEL: 0x8C51
STRING: The thing I met at the bottom of the sea seven years ago.

LABEL: 0x8C80
STRING: If this video, which clearly showed <COOS> encroaching the <SHEEP III>, was passed on to ROMLES,

LABEL: 0x8CD4
STRING: they would surely abandon the ship.

LABEL: 0x8D21
STRING: ...No, was that true?

LABEL: 0x8D48
STRING: After watching every inch of the footage, I thought of a single person.

LABEL: 0x8D89
STRING: He wouldn't abandon them, would he?

LABEL: 0x8DC0
STRING: Saihouji Nozomu―would he be able to choose them this time?

LABEL: 0x8E03
STRING: Or would he sink his own daughters to the bottom of the sea along with <COOS>, after all?

LABEL: 0x8E53
STRING: The last time we met, the day Saihouji Tokiwa woke up...

LABEL: 0x8E87
STRING: I remembered Saihouji Nozomu's face when we parted that day.

LABEL: 0x8EC2
STRING: He smiled faintly, as usual, but he――

LABEL: 0x8EFF
STRING: I believed in his choice.

LABEL: 0x8F32
STRING: And so, I transferred the data.

LABEL: 0x8F5F
STRING: We had to talk about this.

LABEL: 0x8F94
STRING: However, I feared that someone would overhear us inside the facility.

LABEL: 0x8FCF
STRING: I knew I was being too cautious, but I decided on a meeting place.

LABEL: 0x9018
STRING: 「Th##F#########, at the <Isle of Wind>.」

LABEL: 0x911C
STRING: In the dark of night, on the shore of the bay overlooking the <Isle of Wind>... I was waiting for the arrival of Saihouji Nozomu.

LABEL: 0x9179
STRING: Even though it was the middle of summer, the temperature dropped rather low during the night.

LABEL: 0x91D0
STRING: I beat my shoes against the cold asphalt and paced around the bay, pondering the choices I would have to make.

LABEL: 0x923B
STRING: It was still too early for the appointed time.

LABEL: 0x9262
STRING: But surely, if that meticulous man were to come, it would definitely be before our meeting time.

LABEL: 0x92C1
STRING: With that thought in mind, I had been on standby for a while... and it seemed my prediction was correct.

LABEL: 0x9311
STRING: I could see the headlights of a car running along the coast of the bay.

LABEL: 0x934D
STRING: I didn't even need to confirm if it was him or not. Who else would have business here at this time of night?

LABEL: 0x93B0
STRING: Since GPS was unusable right now, he couldn't use full autopilot.

LABEL: 0x93EF
STRING: The movement of the car was somewhat jerky, perhaps because the driver was driving a manual transmission which he was probably not accustomed to.

LABEL: 0x9444
STRING: However...

LABEL: 0x9459
STRING: He had come. This time, he had chosen his daughters.

LABEL: 0x9491
STRING: He passed by me, perhaps not noticing me standing on the bay.

LABEL: 0x94DB
STRING: He parked the car just over 200 meters away.

LABEL: 0x9512
STRING: He turned away from the car and looked out over the sea――

LABEL: 0x9548
STRING: The waves reflecting in the moonlight were somehow mysterious, sharp, and sad.

LABEL: 0x9599
STRING: Just as I was about to head toward the car...

LABEL: 0x95D2
STRING: Suddenly... I caught sight of something floating on the surface of the sea between the waves.

LABEL: 0x9617
STRING: If that big sphere was the head... Was that a pressure-resistant diving suit?

LABEL: 0x965D
STRING: I took out the binoculars I had prepared and peeked through them.

LABEL: 0x9690
STRING: I was not certain of the face peeking through the glass of the diving suit, but if I wasn't imagining it――

LABEL: 0x96E7
STRING: Inside that diving suit was a girl.

LABEL: 0x970F
STRING: ――A familiar-looking girl.

LABEL: 0x9737
STRING: Why was she floating on the sea when she was supposed to be inside the <SHEEP III>?

LABEL: 0x9781
STRING: Were they able to escape safely? Then, where was everyone else?

LABEL: 0x97CA
STRING: ...Hitoha. Where was he?

LABEL: 0x97F0
STRING: She was floating along the shore of the bay.

LABEL: 0x981D
STRING: There was still some distance between us. ...I wondered if Saihouji had noticed her presence.

LABEL: 0x9870
STRING: Still wearing the device, I made a wish.

LABEL: 0x989D
STRING: There was no way my voice should reach at this distance.

LABEL: 0x98D4
STRING: 「You have to rescue them... Hurry! She――」

LABEL: 0x9910
STRING: Nozomu―as if in response to my voice―turned his attention to the sea.

LABEL: 0x994D
STRING: The waves were pulling the girl toward the beach.

LABEL: 0x997E
STRING: Saihouji reached out to her in the diving suit who had washed ashore.

LABEL: 0x99BB
STRING: Despite his position as an important person in ROMLES, he didn't look particularly impressive.

LABEL: 0x9A07
STRING: Nevertheless, he fearlessly waded into the waves while wearing a decent suit, not minding if it got dirty.

LABEL: 0x9A68
STRING: ――And, removed her heavy helmet.

LABEL: 0x9A9E
STRING: At that moment...

LABEL: 0x9AB5
STRING: I saw a light.

LABEL: 0x9AD2
STRING: ――The moment I thought that...

LABEL: 0x9AFB
STRING: My body was blown away.

LABEL: 0x9B2D
STRING: I hit my abdomen, and a voiceless breath escaped my mouth.

LABEL: 0x9B68
STRING: Just like that, I rolled across the asphalt.

LABEL: 0x9B9D
STRING: 一In the blink of an eye, I grasped the situation.

LABEL: 0x9BCC
STRING: I was lying face-down on the ground.

LABEL: 0x9C09
STRING: It seemed that the device I was wearing had unexpectedly served as a helmet.

LABEL: 0x9C56
STRING: I had hit my head hard, but somehow my consciousness was clear.

LABEL: 0x9C94
STRING: What happened――

LABEL: 0x9CB9
STRING: In any case, I had to get up as soon as possible, and the moment I did...

LABEL: 0x9D06
STRING: My reality was shaken to the core by the sight that met my eyes.

LABEL: 0x9D4E
STRING: A burning <Isle of Wind> spread out before me.

LABEL: 0x9D85
STRING: The white windmills were now a pillar of fire.

LABEL: 0x9DB0
STRING: Why was the grave marker that stood in the darkness――

LABEL: 0x9DE1
STRING: ――Rekindled?

LABEL: 0x9E01
STRING: Had the catastrophe I had feared happened now, at this very moment?

LABEL: 0x9E4B
STRING: Why now?!

LABEL: 0x9E68
STRING: What happened to Saihouji Nozomu and the girl in the diving suit?

LABEL: 0x9EA7
STRING: They were closer to the <Isle of Wind> than me... What happened to them?

LABEL: 0x9EE8
STRING: I looked over to the shore and saw the round head of the diving suit.

LABEL: 0x9F2A
STRING: That was――

LABEL: 0x9F43
STRING: I started running.

LABEL: 0x9F6A
STRING: The scenes from seven years ago flashed before my eyes.

LABEL: 0x9F9D
STRING: A girl washed on the shore, unmoving, just like back then.

LABEL: 0x9FE0
STRING: Was she asleep? Or――

LABEL: 0xA008
STRING: The girl didn't move, and I wasn't certain if she was alive or not.

LABEL: 0xA04F
STRING: That explosion――

LABEL: 0xA06D
STRING: If she were to receive the full force of the impact, she wouldn't be entirely safe, even if she was clad in a diving suit.

LABEL: 0xA0CC
STRING: But, if I could make it in time――

LABEL: 0xA0FD
STRING: Once again, I reached my hand out to her.
